short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can now archive Call or Meeting recordings from the time you setup, to the cloud.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
VBC, Zoom, RingCentral users can archive call and meeting recordings from the time that they are set up to the cloud. In our Codimite Archiver,
The daily archiving option is available for Call and Meeting recordings.
Google Drive or OneDrive can be selected as the backup drive.
The Manual sync up option enables users to archive their recordings.
